alert.note: Alert for Washington (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 3:42PM MDT until August 05 at 4:45PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Washington County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 445 PM MDT. * At 341 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles southwest of Anton, or 31 miles south of Akron, moving east at 35 mph. Other storms were developing north of Arikaree School. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Thurman, Arickaree School, Cope and Anton. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows!
